thread.title: Oklahoma Sooners to wear 'Bring the Wood' uniform combo against West Virginia
thread.title_full: Oklahoma Sooners to wear 'Bring the Wood' uniform combo against West Virginia | Dallas Morning News

author: Joshua Friemel
title: Oklahoma Sooners to wear 'Bring the Wood' uniform combo against West Virginia
text:
For the second year in a row, the Oklahoma Sooners will rock their "Bring the Wood" jerseys against the West Virginia Mountaineers.
The combo of crimson helmets, cream pants and crimson jerseys are highlighted by an enlarged OU logo on the side of the helmets.
Head coach Bob Stoops tweeted about the uniform decision this morning.
The Rough Riders Return Saturday. #OUDNA #RespectThePast #BeTheFuture pic.twitter.com/WCHlcputg9
â€” Bob Stoops (@OU_CoachStoops) October 1, 2015 According to the Smoking Musket, the Mountaineers will be wearing their all-white "Stormtrooper" uniform combo in the matchup between the two teams.
Follow Joshua Friemel on Twitter at @Josh_Friemel .
